quizzes.title: Bible Basics
quizzes.description: A quick refresher on milestones in the Bible.

questions.question: Which book opens with the words, "In the beginning"?
questions.explanation: Genesis 1:1 begins with "In the beginning God created...".

questions.question: True or False: Paul wrote letters to the church in Corinth.
questions.explanation: First and Second Corinthians are letters authored by Paul.

questions.question: Who interpreted Pharaoh's dreams about famine?
questions.explanation: Joseph interpreted Pharaoh's dreams in Genesis 41.

questions.question: Which HTML element semantically represents a navigational section?
questions.explanation: <nav> identifies a navigation block for screen readers and search engines.

questions.question: True or False: localStorage persists across browser restarts for the same origin.
questions.explanation: localStorage keeps data until explicitly cleared by code or the user.

questions.question: Which HTTP status typically indicates a resource was not found?
questions.explanation: HTTP 404 means the resource could not be found at the requested URL.
